Intro to Maps

![Pak Map](/pak_map.png){width=80%}

```{r}

library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)

m = leaflet() %>% addTiles() 
m %>% fitBounds(0,40,10,50) %>%
  setView(27.646516510011892, 85.32331506375914, zoom = 17) %>% 
  addPopups(27.646516510011892, 85.32331506375914, "Here is the <b>ICIMOD HQ</b>, Lalitpur")
  
```
